Name: Cavern Escape Extremely Hard game!!!
About the game: Cavern escape is new platformer puzzle game. The goal is simple: Try to drag the small cute character using MOUSE into finish. The walls and other obstacles in platform are bad, avoid them at all costs. It may look easy but it’s tough. Actually, it’s VERY HARD. Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to beat the odds. How far can you go? Game includes: • Over 30 Challenging Levels • Dozens of Unique Puzzles to Solve • EXTREMELY addicting • The Ultimate Casual Brain Teaser • Almost impossible to beat!
